column3: Ao Nyankopɔn
column5: Dwuma bi a idzii no hɔn ber do

column2: "Ɔwo edze wo nsa paam ananaman na edze wo man tsɛɛw hɔ; Ɔwo ituu aman gui
column3: na hɔn dze etserɛɛw hɔn mu."

column2: "Na nnyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn afona na wɔdze nyaa asaase no
column3: Nkyii so nnyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn abasa na ɔgyee hɔn nkwa: Na mbom wo nsa enyimfa
ɔwo nye me Hen: Ɔwo na ehyɛ ma Jakob nya konyimdzi."

column2: "Wo do na yɛnam bosun hɛn atamfo egu famu: Wo dzin do na yɛnam betsiatsia hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia hɛn no do."
"Na meremmfa mo werɛ nnhyɛ m'egyen mu
column3: Nkyii so nnyɛ m'afona na ɔbɛgye me nkwa."

column2: "Na ɔwo na agye hɛn efi hɛn atamfo nsamu
column3: Na ahyɛ hɔn a wɔtan hɛn no enyito."
wo mu na yɛahyehyɛ hɛnho daa nyina
column4: Na yɛdze ndaase bɛma wo dzin daapem."

column3: na ahyɛ hɛn fɛr
column4: Na ennye hɛn dɔm nnkɔ bio."

column2: "Ɔwo ma yɛdan hɛn ekyir ma hɛn atamfo: Na hɔn a wɔtan hɛn fow hɛn fa."
"Ɔwo edze hɛn akyɛ dɛ nguan a wodzi hɔn nam; Na abɔ hɛn apetse amanaman mu."

column3: Na hɔn bo mma w'ahonya nndɔɔ so."

column2: "Ɔwo ama yɛadan sesɛba ama hɛn sɔnmufo
column3: Na hɔn a wɔbɔ hɛn aprɔw hɔn atwetwesi na ehiyi."
Ema aman wosow hɔn tsir wɔ hɛn ho."
Na m'enyito akata mo do
column5: "Wɔ nyia ɔhyɛ amen na ɔka ebususɛm ndze no ntsi
column6: Wɔ atamfo na werdzifo no ntsi."

column3: naaso hɛn werɛ mmfiir wo
Nkyii so hɛn anamɔn nntseer wo kwan ho;"

column2: "Naaso ɔwo ebubu hɛn pasaa wɔ mbrɛ mpataku wɔ
column3: Na edze owu nwinwin akata hɛn do."

column2: "Sɛ hɛn werɛ efir hɛn Nyankopɔn dzin
column3: Anaa yɛatserɛw hɛn nsamu akyerɛ onyame nanaben bi a;"

column2: "Aso nnyɛ ɔwo Nyankopɔn na ebɔhwehwɛ yi? Na ɔwo na inyim akoma mu esumasɛm."

column3: ɔwo ntsi na woku hɛn daa nyina; Wobu hɛn dɛ nguan a worukoku hɔn."
soɛr ɛ
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ennkasa hɛnho yi? Soɛr

column3: Na wo werɛ fir hɛn ahohia na hɛn atseetsee yi?"

column2: "Na hɛn kra abrɛ adze akɔ huntuma mu: Hɛn yafun tar famu."

column3: Na pon hɛn wɔ w'adɔyɛ ntsi."
